"Let me show you how to put them on. You must place it on your shoulder 
blade. It will wrap aroud. so that it wont be immediatly seen each one has 
been given the same coloring of each bot so as to camoflash it." he handed 
each Destron in the room his specialy made device. "Now do as i said and they 
shall work." he put his on. the coil wrapped around him and you could barley 
see it do to its unquie comaphlplase. Megatrom did the same.

--part1_5e.668b252.27a3a263_boundary
